item.title: Bonded to Jesus Christ: Becoming the Salt of the Earth
item.description:
Bonded to Jesus Christ: Becoming the Salt of the Earth by Elder José A. Teixeira, Of the Presidency of the Seventy given in Saturday Afternoon of 194th Semiannual General Conference on Mon Sep 30 2024
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder José A. Teixeira, Of the Presidency of the Seventy
